As a sports enthusiast,I always explore data and stats with respect to all sports.There are a lot of resources for sports analytics which tells us the beauty of sports and data.

Sports has always been part of my life.

**Resources for Sports Analytics:**

All major resources in this blog is covered.If I miss out I will be updating it later.

**Football:**

-   **Fbref-**One of the top football statistics site in which event data can be downloaded across all the famous leagues. [**https://fbref.com/en/**](https://fbref.com/en/)

-   **UnderStat- <https://understat.com/>**

-   **Transfer Markt- <https://www.transfermarkt.co.in/>**

-   **PySport-** All of us use different programming languages for our analysis. PySport is a wonderful site in which we can find lot of packages,data,tutorials,documentation for implementing sport analytics.

    [**https://pysport.org/**](https://pysport.org/)

    They also have a great community and also on discord.The link to the discord [**link**](https://discord.com/invite/pMZ57FC)

-   **StatsBomb-**One of the top sites for football blogs.Analysis is great and they also provide free data.There is a statsBomb conference on 17th March 2021 which is a free online event.Do not miss that.

-   Other football blog sites-

    -   [**https://www.fourfourtwo.com/**](https://www.fourfourtwo.com/)

    -   [**https://fivethirtyeight.com/sports/**](https://fivethirtyeight.com/sports/)

-   **Tutorials-**

    -   [**https://fcpython.com/**](https://fcpython.com/)

    -   [**http://fcrstats.com/**](http://fcrstats.com/)

    -   Friends of Tracking Youtube-[**link**](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUBFJYcag8j2rm_9HkrrA7w)
